# [Interview #1043: Idaho Falls Signing Report - PrncRny, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1043#3)

#### PrncRny's Wife

If using their abilities slowly drives them mad, how can good epics rise up to help?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That is kind of the point of the novel isn't it
